english_translation: There is only one veena; but a thousand throbs for it;
The sound in the string is like the finger of the player.

kannada_original: ಯಾವ ಕರದಲಿ ಎಂಥ ಸೊಗಸು ಮನೆ ಮಾಡಿದೆಯೊ !
english_transliteration: Yāva karadali entha sogasu mane māḍideyō !
english_translation: In which hand has what kind of elegance made its home!
The maturation/mood of the raga is according to the mind! – Muddu Rāma.
